+                  height: 100,
+                ),

+                  'Welcome',

+                  height: 10,
+                ),
+                const Text(
+                  'Please enter your details to continue',

+                  height: 60,
+                  padding:

+                    decoration: InputDecoration(
+                      border: InputBorder.none,
